title: Xiaomi starts recruiting beta testers for global HyperOS 3
summary: Xiaomi unveiled HyperOS 3 in China in late August, and a beta rollout has begun in the meantime in the country. Now, the same is headed to international markets. Today, the official HyperOS account on X announced that recruitment has begun, internationally, for beta testers of the new version. ğŸš€ Eâ€¦

title: Americana Honors & Awards Hand Wins to Nathaniel Rateliff, Sierra Ferrell, Gillian Welch & David Rawlings, MJ Lenderman and Iâ€™m With Her
summary: The Americana Music Honors & Awards handed out its top competitive trophies to Sierra Ferrell, Nathaniel Rateliff & the Night Sweats, Iâ€™m With Her, MJ Lenderman and Gillian Welch & David Rawlings in a ceremony Wednesday night at the Ryman Auditorium in Nashville. Ferrell won the artist of the year â€¦

title: Xiaomi 16 specs leak
summary: Xiaomi is expected to unveil three devices in the flagship 16 series later this month - the 16, the 16 Pro, and the 16 Pro Max. Today, purported specs of the Xiaomi 16 have been outed on X by a tipster. According to this source, the device has a 6.3-inch LTPO OLED screen with "1.5K" resolution and â€¦

title: â€˜Spinal Tap II: The End Continuesâ€™ Review: The Ultimate Spoof Band Gets a Cheeky Send-Off, With a Little Help From Their Friends
summary: With Spinal Tap, the joke never gets old, even if the hilarious-as-ever heavy metal trio is now bordering on geriatric. Well into their 70s, hall-of-fame improv talents Michael McKean and Christopher Guest are the same age as real-life rockers Alice Cooper and Steven Tyler, while slightly older Harâ€¦

title: Nothing starts teasing Nothing OS 4.0 based on Android 16
summary: Google released Android 16 back in June, and at the launch of the Phone (3) in early July, Nothing promised it would roll out the update to Android 16 "later this autumn". Clearly, the Nothing Phone (3) should be the first in line. Today, the company has started teasing Nothing OS 4.0, based on Andâ€¦

title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Pro leaks in more renders showing more angles
summary: A few days ago we saw the first render depicting the upcoming Samsung Galaxy S26 Pro, the Galaxy S25's successor, and today we are treated to even more leaked renders. These are CAD-based and show multiple angles, we also get to see its front for the first time. Samsung is rumored to launch three dâ€¦
